author: Red Means Recording
description:
The Microkorg 2 now supports the LogueSDK. Let's check it out, as well as show why the MK2 does great ambient patching.

Sinevibes: https://www.sinevibes.com/korg/
LogueSDK: https://korginc.github.io/logue-sdk/

Get a Microkorg 2:
Perfect Circuit: https://bit.ly/4ob46UG
Thomann: https://bit.ly/4pXTYAa

Support the channel on Patreon: http://bit.ly/rmrpatreon
Take a lesson with me: https://rmr.media/education

Find my music here: 
https://rmr.media/findme

Connect:
Bluesky: https://bit.ly/3ZGYhom
Website: http://bit.ly/rmrmedia
title: Pleasantly Surprised by the Korg Microkorg 2
